page.title: 02CHANGING TIMES IN EGGINTON
page.content: In the past Egginton hall was the most important building in the village because the local gentry lived in it. The Everys owned most of the buildings in Egginton and most of the land and property. Since then Egginton has changed alot.The population is greater and barns are being converted into houses.A new estate has been built which has enlarged the population of the school.Now most people have cars and so people have jobs outside Egginton where as before people were servants at Egginton hall,farmers or farm labourers.Now most people work at Burton,Derby or East Midlands airport.
